text:
The Office Hours are a bit later this month to avoid clashing with the Shiny in Production conference next week, where we are holding an R Dev Day

:loudspeaker: Contributor Office Hours, Tuesday October 14

Join an online Office Hour to
 - discuss how to get started contributing to R
 - get help/feedback on contributions you are working on
 - look at open bugs/work on translations together

EMEA/APAC, 09:00-10:00 UTC: <https://www.meetup.com/r-contributors/events/308410639/>
AMER, 09:30-10:00 PDT: <https://www.meetup.com/r-contributors/events/311125443/>

Meetup sign-up is helpful so we have an idea who to expect, but here are the zoom links to join directly:

EMEA/APAC: <https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86872140379?pwd=Dx3XGa4jFibEDOMW8k1GuC0zcaBrw0.1>
AMER: <https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83913220856?pwd=hkBMRbH72eXz8zNEYiQB3LzOXETrGZ.1>
